nodes.text: Kor Qunaalac was a planet located in the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space. It was the throneworld of the Qunaalac kajidic.

Kor Qunaalac was the throneworld of the Qunaalac kajidic. This Hutt clan controlled around one-third of the Hutt warships that defended the Bootana Hutta. As a result, Kor Qunaalac was one of the most heavily defended throneworlds in the Bootana Hutta.

The planet had several large landmasses that were largely hilly and wet around their coastal regions, but dry inland with few natural swamps that were the favored habitats of the Hutts. To counter this perceived deficiency, the Qunaalac built many dams across the world to create large lakes and artificial swamps. One of the most well known Qunaalac estates on the world was Fort Dandunc, which housed Qunaalac treasure vaults and war trophies.
